text: Tarapara tadera pechane eseche kichu apadartha, yara uttaradhikari hayeche kitabera; tara nikrsta parthiba upakarana aharana karache ebam balache, amadera ksama kare deya habe. Bastutah emani dharanera upakarana yadi abaro tadera samane upasthita haya, tabe ta'o tule nebe. Tadera kachatheke kitabe ki angikara neya hayani ye, allahara prati satya chara kichu balabe na? Athaca tara se saba'i patha kareche, ya tate lekha rayeche. Bastutah akheratera alaya bhitadera jan'ya uttama-tomara ki ta bojha na
